product_name: Voile Wasatch Speed Girl Backcountry Skis - Women's - 2014/2015
long_description: The Wasatch Speed Girl backcountry skis have a lightweight construction to slay skin tracks and tip rocker for effortless descents. They'll keep you flying whether you're a racer or not.
short_description: The Wasatch Speed Girl backcountry skis have a lightweight construction to slay skin tracks and tip rocker for effortless descents. They'll keep you flying whether you're a racer or not.
